    Method
    Description
    CommentOperations
    CommentOperations.clone()
    Creates and returns a copy of this CommentOperations object.
    CommentOperations
    DraftInfo.getCommentOperations()
    Retrieves draft of the list of operations and the corresponding principals that are overridden in the posting's comments, set for posting drafts, if needed .
    CommentOperations

    Retrieves draft of the list of operations and the corresponding principals that are overridden in the posting's comments .

    Retrieves the operations and the corresponding principals that are overridden in the posting's comments.

    Retrieves the operations and the corresponding principals that are overridden in the posting's comments.

    Retrieves the operations and the corresponding principals that are overridden in the posting's comments.

    Retrieves the supported operations and the corresponding principals.
    CommentOperations

    Retrieves the operations and the corresponding principals.
    CommentOperations
    CommentText.getOperations()
    Retrieves the operations and the corresponding principals.
    CommentOperations
    CommentInfo.getOwnerOperations()
    Retrieves the supported operations and the corresponding principals as defined by the comment's owner.
    CommentOperations
    CommentInfo.getSeniorOperations()
    Retrieves the operations and the corresponding principals that are overridden by the posting's owner ("senior") .
    CommentOperations
    CommentMassAttributes.getSeniorOperations()
    Retrieves the operations and the corresponding principals that are overridden by the comment's owner ("senior") .
    CommentOperations
    CommentSourceText.getSeniorOperations()
    Retrieves the operations and the corresponding principals that are overridden by the posting's owner ("senior"); only the senior may set this .
    CommentOperations
    CommentText.getSeniorOperations()
    Retrieves the operations and the corresponding principals that are overridden by the posting's owner ("senior"); only the senior may set this .
    Methods in org.moera.lib.node.types with parameters of type CommentOperations
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static Principal
    CommentOperations.getAddNegativeReaction(CommentOperations operations, Principal defaultValue)
    Retrieves the permission to add a negative reaction to the comment, or defaultValue if operations is null or the permission is null.
    static Principal
    CommentOperations.getAddReaction(CommentOperations operations, Principal defaultValue)
    Retrieves the permission to add a reaction to the comment, or defaultValue if operations is null or the permission is null.
    static Principal
    CommentOperations.getDelete(CommentOperations operations, Principal defaultValue)
    Retrieves the permission to delete the comment, or defaultValue if operations is null or the permission is null.
    static Principal
    CommentOperations.getEdit(CommentOperations operations, Principal defaultValue)
    Retrieves the permission to edit the comment, or defaultValue if operations is null or the permission is null.
    static Principal
    CommentOperations.getOverrideReaction(CommentOperations operations, Principal defaultValue)
    Retrieves the permission to override the permissions of the comment's reactions, or defaultValue if operations is null or the permission is null.
    static Principal
    CommentOperations.getView(CommentOperations operations, Principal defaultValue)
    Retrieves the permission to view the comment, or defaultValue if operations is null or the permission is null.
    static Principal
    CommentOperations.getViewNegativeReactionRatios(CommentOperations operations, Principal defaultValue)
    Retrieves the permission to view the relative number of different types of the comment's negative reactions, or defaultValue if operations is null or the permission is null.
    static Principal
    CommentOperations.getViewNegativeReactions(CommentOperations operations, Principal defaultValue)
    Retrieves the permission to view the comment's negative reactions, or defaultValue if operations is null or the permission is null.
    static Principal
    CommentOperations.getViewNegativeReactionTotals(CommentOperations operations, Principal defaultValue)
    Retrieves the permission to view the number of the comment's negative reactions, or defaultValue if operations is null or the permission is null.
    static Principal
    CommentOperations.getViewReactionRatios(CommentOperations operations, Principal defaultValue)
    Retrieves the permission to view the relative number of different types of the comment's reactions, or defaultValue if operations is null or the permission is null.
    static Principal
    CommentOperations.getViewReactions(CommentOperations operations, Principal defaultValue)
    Retrieves the permission to view the comment's reactions, or defaultValue if operations is null or the permission is null.
    static Principal
    CommentOperations.getViewReactionTotals(CommentOperations operations, Principal defaultValue)
    Retrieves the permission to view the number of the comment's reactions, or defaultValue if operations is null or the permission is null.
